title: Addams point of view supports argument

content.question: Addamsâ€™ point of view in the excerpt can be used to support which of the following arguments about social reformers during the Gilded Age?

choices.label: Social reformers were most active in the Midwest.
Social reformers achieved many legislative reforms.
Social reformers opposed continued immigration to the United States.
Social reformers explored connections between different social problems.

content.answer: Social reformers explored connections between different social problems.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
